front.title: American National Standard for Limits and Methods of Measurement of Radio Disturbance Characteristics of Information Technology Equipment

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Emission limits are provided that are an are acceptable alternative for limits of the current issue of FCC Part 15, Subpart B, for Information Technology Equipment (ITE). This document republishes CISPR 22 (1993) and Amendment 1 (1995) as an American National Standard, ANSI C63.022-1996, which is recognized within the USA.
